content: Online Data Science Courses (college credit recommended) Online Certificate Programs in Data Science Offered by The Institute for Statistics Education at Statistics.com Do you want to accelerate your career or upgrade the skills of your team members? With Statistics.com , you can learn online with a cohort of  professionals who want to learn - Top experts will answer your questions on a daily basis (our faculty has authored hundreds of books, are from top universities and have real industry experience Google, eBay, Samsung, CoBrain, more). You’ll work on practical exercises with real problems, real data and multiple software tools. You’ll receive individual feedback on your projects and exercises. The class size allows interaction with the instructor and fellow students from around the world. There are no set hours when you must be online, and we estimate you will need about 15 hours per week. This is not a 'MOOC' (massive open online course) -- enrollment is limited, and your instructor will respond to each question that you ask. Processing (NLP) * Sentiment Analysis * Text Mining * Using R Data Mining - R Mapping in R R Graphics R Modeling R Programming Advanced R Programming Intermediate * R Programming Intro 1 * R Programming Intro 2 * R Statistics R ggplot2 IT/Programming Applied Predictive Analytics Building RESTful APIs Consuming RESTful APIs Hadoop * Hadoop - Adv Python * Python - Social Data Mining SAS Programming SQL * Spatial Analytics Mapping in R Spatial Analysis in R Spatial Statistics - GIS * Operations Research and Risk Financial Risk * Optimization - Advanced * Optimization - Intro * Risk Simulation and Queueing * *Evaluated and recommended for college credit by ACE CREDIT®

Statistics.com Online Data Science Courses and Certificates

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Data Science Certificate, Data Science Education, Online Education, R, Statistics.com, Text Analytics

Accelerate your career and upgrade your skills With Statistics.com training provided by top experts who will answer your questions on a daily basis. Work on practical exercises with real problems, real data and multiple software tools.


Online Data Science Courses (college credit recommended)

Online Certificate Programs in Data Science


Offered by The Institute for Statistics Education at Statistics.com

Do you want to accelerate your career or upgrade the skills of your team members?

With Statistics.com , you can learn online with a cohort of  professionals who want to learn -

  • Top experts will answer your questions on a daily basis (our faculty has authored hundreds of books, are from top universities and have real industry experience Google, eBay, Samsung, CoBrain, more).
  • You’ll work on practical exercises with real problems, real data and multiple software tools.
  • You’ll receive individual feedback on your projects and exercises.
  • The class size allows interaction with the instructor and fellow students from around the world.
  • There are no set hours when you must be online, and we estimate you will need about 15 hours per week.
  • This is not a 'MOOC' (massive open online course) -- enrollment is limited, and your instructor will respond to each question that you ask.

Online Certificate Programs in Data Science

  • Analytics for Data Science Certificate Program
  • Programming for Data Science Certificate

 
Online Individual Courses in Data Science

Data Mining and Prediction

  • Applied Predictive Analytics
  • Data Mining - R
  • Decision Trees *
  • Persuasion Analytics
  • Predictive Analytics 1: Machine Learning Tools *
  • Predictive Analytics 2: Neural Nets and Regression *
  • Predictive Analytics 3: Dimension, Clustering, and Association Rules *

Data Analytics

  • Choice Modeling
  • Logistic Regression
  • Microarray Analysis
  • Social Network Analysis *
  • Interactive Data Visualization *
  • Cluster Analysis *
  • Forecasting Analytics *

Text Analytics

  • NLP using NLTK
  • Natural Lang. Processing (NLP) *
  • Sentiment Analysis *
  • Text Mining *

Using R

  • Data Mining - R
  • Mapping in R
  • R Graphics
  • R Modeling
  • R Programming Advanced
  • R Programming Intermediate *
  • R Programming Intro 1 *
  • R Programming Intro 2 *
  • R Statistics
  • R ggplot2

IT/Programming

  • Applied Predictive Analytics
  • Building RESTful APIs
  • Consuming RESTful APIs
  • Hadoop *
  • Hadoop - Adv
  • Python *
  • Python - Social Data Mining
  • SAS Programming
  • SQL *

Spatial Analytics

  • Mapping in R
  • Spatial Analysis in R
  • Spatial Statistics - GIS *

Operations Research and Risk

  • Financial Risk *
  • Optimization - Advanced *
  • Optimization - Intro *
  • Risk Simulation and Queueing *

*Evaluated and recommended for college credit by ACE CREDIT®
